title: Co-President
description: Lead 8 core members in optimizing logistics, outreach, teaching, and development, coordinating with other co-president

title: Co-Director
description: Direct the organizers in preparation of HackUMass X, focusing on the technology and hardware components of the event

title: Technical Lead
description: Served as the technical lead for a team of 4 software developers and 2 business developers, responsible for building the user interface of a data analytics solution for a fintech startup

title: Director of Technology
description: Supervised the development team in designing the organization's landing page, using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and building CICapi - a unified back-end for handling member logistics using Flask, Firebase, and Heroku, with 170+ users

title: Member, Organizing Team
description: Overhauled HackUMass's landing website with novel functionalities and UI bug fixes, implemented 3 new enhancements, and resolved 5+ bugs in Dashboard, the event's logistics management solution on Ruby on Rails
Designed and created logos, icons, and mockups for the events and assembled the sponsorship prospectus

title: Software Developer
description: Partially developed a career enhancement tool in Django + TailwindCSS framework for a student-run startup, as part of a team of 4 software developers, 1 tech lead, and 2 business developers
Created an interactive landing site for the UMass Entrepreneurship Club using React, CSS, and Netlify CMS, along with 2 other software developers, 1 tech lead, and 1 business developer

title: President
description: Oversaw student discipline and adherence to code of conduct
Represented the students' interests in administrative meetings
Liaised between students, faculty, and administration
Supervised the student-run events in lieu of school coordinator

title: Lead Designer
description: Led the organization's design initiative for annual event
Created posters, banners, & prospectus for November event
Designed ID cards & certificates for speakers and volunteers
Coordinated with other departments of the Organizing Committee

title: Honorary Advisor
description: Mentored junior teams for aerospace competitions and summits
Took part in promoting space exploration and colonization to peers
Advised the executive team regarding new focuses for the club
